titleInfo.title: Martha White Flour plugs - "Bust Your Oven Door Wide Open"

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. mods.abstract: Four identical 20-second plugs for Martha White self-rising flour, read by T. Tommy Cutrer impersonating Tennessee Ernie Ford. Content identical to [ TR002166 ].

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
